page.syntax: Position as N = *ATC_MULTI(C search_string,C strings[,N occurrence])

argument.name: Position
argument.description: The position of the firstof the multiple strings in the Find_Stringsargument. Zero if the characters were not found.

argument.name: search_string
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited string containing one or more strings to find.

argument.name: occurrence
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The occurrence to find. Numeric

page.description: Returns the position where one of a cr-lf delimited list of strings is found in another.
page.discussion: The *ATC_MULTI() function returns the position in Search_In_Stringof the firstof the multiple strings in the Find_Stringsargument. Limitations: The Find_Stringsargument is case sensitive.
page.example:
? *atc_multi(comma_to_crlf("oranges,apples"),"This string contains apples and oranges") = 22
? *atc_multi(comma_to_crlf("oranges,apples"),"This string contains apples and oranges",2) = 33
? *atc_multi(comma_to_crlf("oranges,apples"),"This string contains apples and oranges",3) = 0
